name: Overview
headline: AI vision sensors for manufacturing
description: Overview is a company that takes the cutting edge in computer vision and deep learning and applies it to previously unsolvable manufacturing inspection problems. We are truly a full stack company. We install physical cameras into the facility, run inference on the edge and manage massive deployments. Overview also streams gigabytes of video/image data to the cloud for our web platform to give customers advanced insights and analytics.

founders.name: Austin Appel, Founder
founders.description:
Austin Appel is the head of product and a co-founder at Overview, where he is responsible for leading product development and operations. With over 8 years of experience in manufacturing, he works with customers to ensure that customers can quickly adopt and use artificial intelligence-based computer vision systems.

Previously, Austin spent four years at Tesla in manufacturing and R&D.

Austin holds BS Degrees in Manufacturing Engineering and Mechanical Engineering from Northwestern University.

founders.name: Russell Nibbelink, Founder
founders.description:
I am the head of engineering and a co-founder at Overview. 

Before joining Overview, I was a software engineer at Salesforce, where I worked on web-scale infrastructure projects, including the migration of Salesforce’s largest customers to upgraded hardware with no downtime.

I received his Bachelor of Science from the University of California Berkeley College of Engineering, where I was also the head teaching assistant in the field of High Performance Computing.

founders.name: Christopher Van Dyke, Founder
founders.description: After 8 years at Tesla I founded Overview. Overview provides cameras and AI recognition algorithms to help manufacturers automate inspection steps, improve uptime, and reduce errors on their manufacturing lines. At Tesla, I built the team that designed the Gigafactory and launched the Supercharger network.

## Now simpler than ever.
We’re so confident it works, we’ll demo it on **your** parts.
[ Book my demo ](https://overview.ai/</contact-us/>)

## Breakthrough AI using vision transformers.
  * Higher accuracy with less data required. 
  * Fastest time-to-value.
  * Ease of use of a vision sensor, with the power of a vision system.
  * Reliable even in complex and changing environments.


## The only smart camera with the full computing power of a PC.
  * Integrated NVIDIA GPU delivers power and precision.
  * Fast and efficient, on-device training.
  * Run robust, complex algorithms, no programming required.
  * No software downloads.


![](https://overview.ai/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/Frame-1597878589-1024x756.png)
![](https://overview.ai/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/newss44-1024x729.png)
## Get to 100% accuracy faster – with confidence.
  * Real production data is better. Do more with 300,000 images stored onboard. 
  * Proprietary software rapidly and efficiently mitigates escapes.
  * Creating defects no longer required.
  * Never-before-seen defects automatically flagged.


## Solve all your vision needs.
[ Talk to an Expert ](https://overview.ai/</contact-us/>)
## Testimonials
“I can’t believe I’ve spent 2 months working with our current system, when I could have been done in 3 hours with your system.” 
Automotive OEMVision Engineer, 
“You guys are kicking Cognex and Keyence a** compared to anything I've seen.” 
Tier 1Lead Automation Engineer,
“I need to inspect a lot of things, all at once, accurately, that’s why I’m using the OV20i.” 
Automotive OEMSenior Quality Process Engineer,
“Using this camera has allowed me to do inspections that I didn’t think were possible to do accurately.” 
Tier 1Automation Engineer,
“The efficiency of deployments across the entire plant has allowed us to tackle more problems, faster, than we predicted.” 
Tier 1VP of Manufacturing,
“Cognex is confusing to use, Keyence is OK, but the OV20i is ridiculously easy to use.” 
Tier 2Controls Engineer,
“I am going to use this camera instead of our in-house vision system.” 
Automotive OEMSenior Vision Engineer,
“We couldn’t be happier with the solution Overview provided; their engineering and customer support was truly outstanding. We can now quickly verify the status of a manufactured component or complete system because we have a visual record. Artificial intelligence and automation have eliminated the complexity of finding good and bad parts, leading to zero defects in the manufacturing process. This approach is extremely accurate and cost-effective.” 
Medical Device ManufacturerVP of Operations,
“The OV20i is an awesome robust camera that is simple to use. The intuitive interface makes this camera a top pick for me. You can have a working camera up and running that accurately detects defects in less than 30 min.” 
Plastics ManufacturerLead Advanced Manufacturing Engineer,
## Interoperable and customizable to your factory.

### Seamless communication with most industrial protocols.
![](https://overview.ai/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/img-Library2-1.png)

generated_description:
**Overview Company Summary**

**Name:** Overview

**Founded:** 2019

**Location:** San Francisco, California

**Team Size:** 15 employees

**Y Combinator Batch:** W19

### Mission:
Overview is all about revolutionizing manufacturing through advanced AI vision sensors. Their goal is straightforward: leverage cutting-edge computer vision and deep learning to tackle previously unsolvable inspection challenges in manufacturing. 

### What They Do:
They're a full-stack solution provider. This means they don’t just sell you cameras; they install physical cameras right into your facilities. These cameras run inference at the edge, managing extensive deployments while also streaming massive amounts of video and image data to the cloud. From there, their web platform delivers sophisticated insights and analytics that manufacturers need to improve quality control processes.

### Key Features:
- **High Accuracy Inspections:** Overview's technology provides high-speed inspections that can detect non-obvious defects, ensuring that product quality isn't just a goal but a guarantee.
- **Breakthrough AI Technology:** By utilizing vision transformers, they achieve higher accuracy with less data, offering faster time-to-value and ease of use.
- **Powerful Hardware:** Their smart cameras carry the full computing capabilities of a PC, featuring integrated NVIDIA GPUs for powerful processing and real-time insights.
- **Customizable Solutions:** Overview’s systems are designed to be interoperable and customizable, making them adaptable to diverse factory environments.

### Client Satisfaction:
The feedback from users highlights an overwhelmingly positive experience, with many claiming that Overview has outperformed competitors like Cognex and Keyence. Features such as interactivity, user-friendly design, and reliable defect detection are frequently praised.

### Partnerships:
Overview's strategic partnership with Group Partner Nan enhances their ability to innovate and reach manufacturing sectors effectively.

### Tags:
- Deep Learning
- IoT
- Computer Vision
- San Francisco Bay Area

### Contact Information:
- **Website:** [Overview.ai](https://overview.ai)
- **Email:** contact@overview.ai
- **Phone:** (844) 799-7044

For manufacturers looking to improve their inspection processes, Overview presents a compelling option that's both advanced and user-friendly. In a landscape where quality control can make or break a company, having real-time, accurate, and reliable inspection solutions is not just an advantage; it's essential. If you're in the manufacturing business, it might be time to get an overview of what Overview can do for you.
